messages.content: You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
What are those cute earbuds you're wearing?
A (Kylie): Hey everyone! These are the new Lenovo GM2 earbuds, and they're seriously amazing!
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
How much are they?
A (Kylie): Hold up! You guys watching this live stream get a special discount! Snag them for only $11.89 – that's 30% off the regular price. This deal won't last long, though!
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
Do they come in different colors?

A (Kylie): Right now they're just in black, which is super sleek, but wouldn't a rose gold or a cute dusty pink be amazing? Maybe we can convince Lenovo to do a Kylie collab in the future! Let me know what colors you'd love in the comments!
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
Are these good for working out?

A (Kylie): Absolutely! They're sweatproof and have this secure fit that won't budge even during the most intense workouts. You can totally slay that HIIT session without having to worry about them falling out.
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
Can I use them for calls too?

A (Stormi walks by in the background) Hey there, my little fashionista! (Back to the camera) Oh yeah, and they have a built-in microphone for crystal clear calls. So, you can chat with your bestie or your stylist – whoever needs your fabulous attention! Sound Quality:
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
How's the sound quality?

A (Kylie puts on the earbuds and bobs her head to a beat) OMG, the sound is incredible! Like, seriously immersive and the bass is boomin'. It's like having a mini concert right in your ears! Perfect for listening to my latest playlist or catching up on my fave podcasts.
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
Do they have noise cancellation?

A (Kylie pretends to zip up a jacket) You know how sometimes you just need to block out the world and focus? (Smiles) That's where the noise cancellation comes in. It lets you shut out distractions and get lost in your music or that audiobook you've been meaning to finish.
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
Are they loud enough?
A (Kylie holds up the earbuds playfully) Let's just say they're loud enough to get you pumped for a shoot, a night out, or just chilling at home. You won't miss a beat with these bad boys! Features:
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
How long does the battery last?

A (Kylie checks her phone) No more scrambling for a charger every five minutes, babes! These earbuds last for ages – like 5 hours per charge, and the charging case gives you even more listening time. Basically, you can be on the go all day without worrying about running out of juice.
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
Do they have touch controls?

A (Kylie taps her earbud twice) Yup! These have super easy touch controls for operating music, calls, and volume. No need to fumble with your phone – you can control everything right from your ear. So convenient! ‍
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
Are they comfortable?

A (Kylie adjusts the earbuds) Comfort is key, especially for us busy girls on the go! These earbuds come with different sized ear tips, so you can find the perfect fit for your ears. They're lightweight and comfy, so you can wear them all day without any problems. Buying and Shipping:
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
How can I get a pair?
A (Kylie winks) Don't miss out, loves! Click the link in my bio to snag these cuties before they're gone! This discount is only for my live stream viewers, so hurry! ‍♀️
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
Do you ship internationally?
A (Kylie checks her phone) Check the description box below the live stream for all the shipping info! (Looks back at the camera) But seriously, don't wait! This deal is too good to miss.
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
What's your return policy?
A (Kylie shrugs) No worries, babes! You can check the Lenovo website for their return policy details.
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
OMG Kylie, are those the new Lenovo earbuds everyone is talking about?
A (Kylie): Hey boo! You got it! Obsessed with the Lenovo GM2 earbuds – they're like little soundproof sanctuaries for my ears!
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
Do they stay in during workouts? My AirPods are always falling out!
A (Kylie pretends to punch the air) Girl, been there! These have this secure fit that won't budge, no matter how intense your workout gets. Squats, lunges, burpees – you name it, they'll stay put!
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
Spill the tea on the sound quality! Is the bass good?

A (Kylie puts on the earbuds and bobs her head) The sound is FIRE! Seriously crystal clear, and the bass – let's just say it'll get your heart thumping like a Miami beat. Perfect for jamming out to my latest playlists or that new Travis Scott collab everyone's obsessed with.
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
These look so cute! Do they come in any other colors besides black?

A (Kylie pouts playfully) Black is a classic, but wouldn't a soft pink or a holographic finish be, like, the ultimate fashion statement? (Looks at the camera with a sly smile) Maybe we can hint-hint to Lenovo about a Kylie collab with some exclusive colors in the future, huh?
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
Hold on, can you answer calls with these too?

A (Kylie pretends to hold a phone to her ear with the earbuds) Duh! Built-in microphone for crystal clear calls, babe. So you can take a work call or chat with your BFF – all hands-free and looking flawless, of course.
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
Living for the live stream discount! How long will it last?

A (Kylie taps her wristwatch dramatically) This amazing deal is ticking, loves! The discount for my live stream viewers is only here for a limited time. Click the link in my bio before it disappears faster than a double-tap on a hot Instagram pic!
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
Are they easy to use? I'm not the most tech-savvy person.

A (Kylie pretends to fumble with a phone, then smiles) No worries, girl! These are super user-friendly. They connect to your phone automatically, and the touch controls are easy to learn – volume, music, calls, all at your fingertips (well, ear tips!).
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
Do they hurt your ears after a while?
A (Kylie adjusts the earbuds) Comfort is key! These come with different sized ear tips for a perfect fit, and they're super lightweight. So you can rock them all day without any ouchies.
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
Wait, Kylie, do you actually use these earbuds yourself?

A (Kylie smiles genuinely) Absolutely! Love them for the gym, running errands, or just chilling at home. The sound quality is amazing, and the noise cancellation is a lifesaver when you need to block out the world.
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
This live stream is so much fun! Any chance of a giveaway for some lucky viewers?
A (Kylie winks) Maybe... Keep an eye on the comments for a surprise giveaway announcement later in the live stream!
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
These earbuds look amazing, Kylie! Are they waterproof?
A (Kylie splashes water on her hand playfully) Not quite waterproof, babe! But they are sweatproof, so you don't have to worry about ruining them during a workout.
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
Can you compare these earbuds to other brands? Are they worth the price?

A (Kylie holds up the earbuds and shrugs) Honestly, the sound quality and features on these are amazing, especially for the price! (Looks directly at the camera) I've tried some other high-end earbuds, and these Lenovo GM2s seriously compete. Plus, the live stream discount makes them a total steal!
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
Living for your style, Kylie! Do these earbuds come with a carrying case?

A (Kylie pulls out the charging case from her purse) Yes girl! They come with this cute little charging case that keeps them protected and charged on the go. It's small enough to toss in your purse or gym bag, so you can take your music anywhere.
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
Some earbuds make my ears itchy. Do these have soft ear tips?

A (Kylie holds up the earbuds and points to the tips) These actually come with three different sizes of ear tips, so you can find the perfect fit for your ears. They're made from this soft, comfortable silicone material, so no more itchiness!
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
Kylie, how long does it take to charge the earbuds?

A (Kylie pretends to check her watch) No more waiting around for hours! The earbuds themselves charge up in about an hour, and the charging case gives you multiple charges. So basically, you can listen to music all day without having to worry about running out of juice.
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
These earbuds sound perfect for travel! Do they connect easily to airplanes?

A (Kylie pretends to mime putting on a sleep mask on a plane) Totally! They connect to any Bluetooth device, so you can watch movies, listen to music, or even take calls on your next flight. Noise cancellation on a plane? Yes, please!
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
Kylie, are these earbuds good for gamers?

A (Kylie pretends to hold a controller) From what I've heard, the low-latency mode is a game-changer for gamers! It keeps the sound perfectly in sync with the action on screen, no more lag. So you can dominate the competition in style!
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
This live stream is so informative! Do you have any tips for keeping your earbuds clean?

A (Kylie pretends to wipe the earbuds) Great question! Just a quick wipe with a soft, dry cloth is all you need to keep them clean. And maybe avoid sharing them with your bestie – germs and all that, you know? (Winks)
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
Hey Kylie, are these earbuds a good gift idea?

A (Kylie holds up two earbuds playfully) Absolutely! They're stylish, affordable, and everyone loves good music (or podcasts, audiobooks – you get the idea!). Perfect for birthdays, holidays, or just because. (Smiles)
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
Last question, Kylie! What's your favorite feature of the Lenovo GM2 earbuds?

A (Kylie taps her earbud twice and smiles) Honestly, it's a toss-up between the amazing sound quality and the noise cancellation. But the fact that they're wireless and come in this sleek black design – major bonus points!
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
This deal is amazing, Kylie! How long will it take to get my earbuds if I order now?

A (Kylie holds up the earbuds and pretends to zip them into a package) Don't wait, loves! Shipping is super fast – typically 3-4 business days, with a max of 7 days. So you can be rocking your new earbuds in no time!
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
Hold on, the 30% discount sounds too good to be true! Is there a catch?
A (Kylie laughs playfully) Nope, no catch here! This exclusive discount is just for my amazing live stream viewers. The price is already marked down to $11.89, but this deal won't last forever.
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
Do you ship internationally, Kylie? I'm dying to get my hands on these earbuds!

A (Kylie checks her phone) Check the description box below the live stream for all the shipping info! (Looks back at the camera) But seriously, this discount is only valid for a limited time, so don't miss out!
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
Wait, can I use the 30% discount on multiple pairs of earbuds? Thinking of getting some for my friends too!

A (Kylie holds up two earbuds and smiles) That's such a cute idea! Unfortunately, the discount is only valid for one purchase per person. But hey, your friends will love these earbuds too! Maybe you can convince them to snag a pair with their own discount code.
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
This is my first time buying from Lenovo. Is their website secure?
A (Kylie holds up her phone and pretends to type) Absolutely! Lenovo is a super reputable brand, and their website uses secure payment processing. So you can shop with confidence, babe!
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
Ugh, I missed the live stream! Is there any way I can still get the 30% discount on the earbuds?

A (Kylie pretends to think for a moment) Hmm, that's a tough one... (Smiles) Okay, okay, maybe I can drop a hint in the comments section later if there are any other discount codes available. Keep an eye out!
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
Do the Lenovo earbuds come with a warranty? Just in case anything happens.
A (Kylie shrugs playfully) You got it, girl! Lenovo offers warranties on their products. You can check their website for the details, but these earbuds are built to last.
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
I'm on a tight budget, Kylie. Are these earbuds worth the price, even without the discount?

A (Kylie nods enthusiastically) Absolutely! Even at the regular price, these earbuds offer amazing sound quality, noise cancellation, and a comfortable fit. They're seriously a steal compared to other brands!
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
Hey Kylie, are there any hidden fees or extra charges when I order the earbuds?
A (Kylie holds up the earbuds and shakes her head) Nope! The price you see with the discount is the price you pay. No surprises, just amazing sound at a fraction of the cost!
You are discussing Lenovo GM2 earbuds during a TikTok Live session.
Last question about the discount! Can I use any other coupon codes with the 30% off for the live stream?

A (Kylie pretends to read the fine print) Unfortunately, the live stream discount is already such an amazing deal that it can't be combined with any other promo codes. But trust me, this is the best price you'll find on these earbuds! 45.Q: Hold on, Kylie! How long do the earbuds actually take to charge?A (Kylie pretends to check her watch) No waiting around forever, babe! The earbuds themselves charge up in about an hour, which is super quick. 46:Q: Does the charging case need to be plugged in all the time?A (Kylie shakes her head) Nope! The case itself holds a charge that can power the earbuds multiple times. So you can use them all day without worrying about running out of juice for the case itself. 47.Q: Can I use any charger with the case, or does it come with one?A (Kylie holds up the case and points to a port) The case comes with a built-in USB-C charging port, so you can use any USB-C cable you already have. 48.Q: Ugh, I always forget to charge my earbuds! Do they ever die on you, Kylie?A (Kylie pretends to gasp dramatically) The horror! But seriously, the charging case gives you plenty of warning before the earbuds themselves run out of juice. There's a little indicator light on the case, so you can always check the battery level. 49.Q: Can I use a wireless charger to charge the case?A (Kylie shrugs) Unfortunately, the case doesn't support wireless charging yet. But hey, who knows what cool features they might add in the future! Using Time: 50.Q: Okay, the charging sounds good. But how long do the earbuds actually last on a single charge?A (Kylie holds up two fingers) Get this – each earbud gets about 5 hours of listening time on a single charge! That's plenty for your workout, commute, or just jamming out to your favorite playlist. 51.A (Kylie pretends to do math with her fingers) With the charging case, you get multiple charges out of the earbuds – up to 20 hours total! Basically, you can listen to music all day long without having to worry about running out of battery. 52.Q: Does using the noise cancellation feature affect the battery life?A (Kylie nods) Slightly, babe. But it's worth it to block out all those distractions! The battery life is still amazing even with noise cancellation on. 53.Q: Can I leave the earbuds in the charging case all the time, or will that damage them?A (Kylie shakes her head) Nope, you're good to go! The case is designed to keep your earbuds safe and charged. So go ahead and leave them in there when you're not using them. 54.Q: Do the earbuds automatically turn off when I put them back in the case?A (Kylie pretends to put the earbuds in the case) Smart girl! Yes, the earbuds have a magnetic sensor that automatically turns them off and starts charging when you put them back in the case. Bonus Questions: 55.Q: Hey Kylie, can you answer calls while the earbuds are charging?A (Kylie pretends to hold a phone to her ear with the earbuds in) Absolutely! The earbuds still function for calls even when they're charging in the case. So you can take that important call without missing a beat. #MultitaskingQueen 56.Q: Do the earbuds ever disconnect from my phone randomly?A (Kylie frowns) Nope! These bad boys have Bluetooth 5.0 technology for a strong and stable connection. No more annoying dropouts while you're listening to music. 57.Q: Living for the long battery life! Do the earbuds ever need to be completely drained before I charge them?A (Kylie shakes her head) Nope! Lithium-ion batteries, like the ones in these earbuds, actually prefer to be charged more
